### 1 Introduction

This report will detail the first explorations on the dataset provided through the Kaggle.com competition *House Prices: Advanced Regression Techniques*. 

The final goal of this competition is to create a predicition algorythm for the prices of houses in Ames, Iowa, based on 79 variables. The test set consists of 1459 observations, while the training set consists of 1460 observations. 

For a concise description of the different variables please refer to the data_description.txt file enclosed in the repository.
